title: All the other moms will be jelly - Lexus RZ450e
description: Better sleep makes a better you! Check out Eight Sleep at  and use code LMG for $150 off the Pod Cover.  The Lexus RZ450e sure is pretty, but does it have the power and range people expect from their EVs? Alex is here to check out the ultimate mom vehicle to see if you get enough of the benefits of an EV or if this SUV is more just for looks.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Lexus made this car look goooooooood 0:40 Exterior impressions 4:00 Interior impressions 6:20 Reverse go beeeeep 6:52 Sponsor - Eight Sleep! 7:20 Driving impressions 10:15 Speakers 11:10 Lexus infotainment 14:00 Sending it through corners 15:00 Overall thoughts 16:02 Pricing 16:56 Outro
